job_info.title: Freelance AI/3D Developer – Avatar Dataset Training (Remote)
job_info.description:
About Us:
Circle of Care Academy is an inclusive education initiative building accessible, AI-powered tools to support diverse learners. We are currently exploring 3D avatar solutions that integrate sign language datasets and improve interactive learning experiences.

Role Overview:
We are seeking a freelance AI/3D developer with experience in working on avatar training models using existing open-source datasets. This is a part-time, contract-based opportunity with an initial budget of USD $100/month, ideal for a student, hobbyist, or early-career developer looking to collaborate on a meaningful project.

Responsibilities:

Work with open-source 3D human model datasets (e.g., SMPL, MVP-Human, SynBody)

Assist in model selection, cleaning, and basic training for avatar generation

Provide guidance on low-cost or open-source tools to optimize performance

Share lightweight documentation and test outputs

Communicate progress clearly with the Head of Operations (remote)


Requirements:

Experience with AI model training, 3D avatar pipelines, or motion capture

Familiarity with Python, PyTorch/TensorFlow, and Blender or Unity

Comfortable using Google Colab or HuggingFace for hosted training

Knowledge of sign language datasets (ASL/BSL) is a bonus, not mandatory


Budget:
$100/month (adjustable based on task completion, impact, and continued collaboration)

How to Apply:
DM or email with your:

Short intro

Relevant portfolio or GitHub

Availability and timezone

Comfort level with the proposed budget and tools
